author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MILTON EXPECTED TO BECOME A MAJOR HURRICANE IN THE NEXT DAY OR  SO...
summary:
...MILTON EXPECTED TO BECOME A MAJOR HURRICANE IN THE NEXT DAY OR  SO...
 As of 7:00 PM CDT Sun Oct 6
 the center of Milton was located near 22.5, -93.4
 with movement E at 7 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 981 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.
